meanings.definition: An affix added to the end of a word to modify its meaning.
meanings.sent1: I learned about postfixes in my English class.
meanings.sent2: The postfixes in the English language can change the meaning of words.
meanings.sent3: The postfixes seemed to have a party at the end of the words.
meanings.sent4: The postfixes were like tiny surprises waiting at the end of the words.
meanings.sent5: The postfixes were like little helpers that modified the words they were attached to.

meanings.definition: A letter or group of letters added to the end of a word to form a new word or alter its meaning.
meanings.sent1: She added postfixes to the words to create new ones.
meanings.sent2: Postfixes can completely change the meaning of a word.
meanings.sent3: The postfixes were like the cherry on top of the word sundae.
meanings.sent4: The postfixes were like magical keys that unlocked new meanings.
meanings.sent5: The postfixes were like secret codes that transformed the words they touched.
